title: MBA Capstone Competency Development: Client-Centered Team Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational business administration knowledge and practical experience (3+ years in administrative/managerial roles)
context.additional_context: Learners use personal devices (tablets/laptops) for project research and collaboration tools (MS Teams, Google Workspace, etc.), participating in team projects solving real corporate challenges.

learning_goals: Students can analyze client requirements to develop business project implementation plans.
Students can propose solutions to real-world business problems through team collaboration and finalize results as reports and presentation materials.
Students can evaluate business opportunities identified during projects and propose actionable strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
